title: This Movie is Boring..
review: There's lack of action in the whole movie. The Jokes of J is outdated. Going back to history is nice one, great imaginative concept, but, they haven't brought up that Idea here in this movie.The future seeking man has done his best part in this movie... The key that he kept secret in his brain is eye-catching.There's lack of action in the whole movie. The Jokes of J is outdated.
